title: Chuy’s Creamy Jalapeno Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 cup strained pickled jalapenos from jar
Note: You can also add in 1/3 cup sour cream to this recipe if you’d like to make it a little bit creamier and more flavorful, but it’s not totally necessary.
instructions: All you need to do is mix the ingredients in a blender or food processor until smooth! You may wish to play around with the amount of buttermilk a little bit to reach the consistency you’re looking for, but we’ve found the above proportions to be pretty darn close to the restaurant version.
source: Posted Houston on the cheap website.  Not truly the Chuy’s recipe but a copy cat version.
